verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> The word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> came also unto me saying

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor תִקַּ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> Thou shalt not take לְךָ֖ אִשָּׁ֑ה <S%H802><s%> thee a wife וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor יִהְי֤וּ <S%H1961><s%> have לְךָ֙ בָּנִ֣ים <S%H1121><s%> neither shalt thou have sons וּבָנ֔וֹת <S%H1323><s%> or daughters בַּמָּק֖וֹם <S%H4725><s%> in this place הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> this

כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> For כֹ֣ה ׀ <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> For thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> concerning הַבָּנִים֙ <S%H1121><s%> concerning the sons וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and concerning הַבָּנ֔וֹת <S%H1323><s%> and concerning the daughters הַיִּלּוֹדִ֖ים <S%H3205><s%> that are born בַּמָּק֣וֹם <S%H4725><s%> in this place הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> this וְעַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> concerning אִמֹּתָ֞ם <S%H517><s%> and concerning their mothers הַיֹּלְד֣וֹת <S%H3205><s%> that bare אוֹתָ֗ם <S%H853><s%> וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> concerning אֲבוֹתָ֛ם <S%H1><s%> them and concerning their fathers הַמּוֹלִדִ֥ים <S%H3205><s%> beget אוֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> בָּאָ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> them in this land הַזֹּֽאת׃ <S%H2063><s%> likewise

מְמוֹתֵ֨י <S%H4463><s%> deaths תַחֲלֻאִ֜ים <S%H8463><s%> of grievous יָמֻ֗תוּ <S%H4191><s%> They shall die לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not יִסָּֽפְדוּ֙ <S%H5594><s%> they shall not be lamented וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> or יִקָּבֵ֔רוּ <S%H6912><s%> neither shall they be buried לְדֹ֛מֶן <S%H1828><s%> [but] they shall be as dung עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> upon the face הָאֲדָמָ֖ה <S%H127><s%> of the earth יִֽהְי֑וּ <S%H1961><s%> will become וּבַחֶ֤רֶב <S%H2719><s%> by the sword וּבָֽרָעָב֙ <S%H7458><s%> and by famine יִכְל֔וּ <S%H3615><s%> and they shall be consumed וְהָיְתָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> will become נִבְלָתָם֙ <S%H5038><s%> and their carcases לְמַאֲכָ֔ל <S%H3978><s%> shall be meat לְע֥וֹף <S%H5775><s%> for the fowls הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <S%H8064><s%> of heaven וּלְבֶהֱמַ֥ת <S%H929><s%> and for the beasts הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the earth ס

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For כֹ֣ה ׀ <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> For thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תָּבוֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> Enter בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> not into the house מַרְזֵ֔חַ <S%H4798><s%> of mourning וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תֵּלֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> go לִסְפּ֔וֹד <S%H5594><s%> to lament וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תָּנֹ֖ד <S%H5110><s%> nor bemoan לָהֶ֑ם כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אָסַ֨פְתִּי <S%H622><s%> them for I have taken away אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁלוֹמִ֜י <S%H7965><s%> my peace מֵאֵ֨ת <S%H853><s%> הָעָ֤ם־ <S%H5971><s%> from this people הַזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> this נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחֶ֖סֶד <S%H2617><s%> [even] lovingkindness וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָֽרַחֲמִֽים׃ <S%H7356><s%> and mercies

וּמֵ֨תוּ <S%H4191><s%> shall die גְדֹלִ֧ים <S%H1419><s%> Both the great וּקְטַנִּ֛ים <S%H6996><s%> and the small בָּאָ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in this land הַזֹּ֖את <S%H2063><s%> likewise לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor יִקָּבֵ֑רוּ <S%H6912><s%> they shall not be buried וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor יִסְפְּד֣וּ <S%H5594><s%> neither shall [men] lament לָהֶ֔ם <S%H1992><s%> like וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor יִתְגֹּדַ֔ד <S%H1413><s%> for them nor cut וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor יִקָּרֵ֖חַ <S%H7139><s%> themselves nor make themselves bald לָהֶֽם׃ <S%H1992><s%> like

וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor יִפְרְס֥וּ <S%H6536><s%> Neither shall [men] tear לָהֶ֛ם עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in אֵ֖בֶל <S%H60><s%> [themselves] for them in mourning לְנַחֲמ֣וֹ <S%H5162><s%> to comfort עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> for מֵ֑ת <S%H4191><s%> them for the dead וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor יַשְׁק֤וּ <S%H8248><s%> to drink אוֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> כּ֣וֹס <S%H3563><s%> neither shall [men] give them the cup תַּנְחוּמִ֔ים <S%H8575><s%> of consolation עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> anyone's אָבִ֖יו <S%H1><s%> for their father וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> or אִמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H517><s%> or for their mother

וּבֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> into the house מִשְׁתֶּ֥ה <S%H4960><s%> of feasting לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not תָב֖וֹא <S%H935><s%> Thou shalt not also go לָשֶׁ֣בֶת <S%H3427><s%> to sit אוֹתָ֑ם <S%H854><s%> for לֶאֱכֹ֖ל <S%H398><s%> with them to eat וְלִשְׁתּֽוֹת׃ <S%H8354><s%> and to drink ס

כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> For כֹ֨ה <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֜ר <S%H559><s%> For thus saith יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָאוֹת֙ <S%H6635><s%> of hosts אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel הִנְנִ֨י <S%H2005><s%> I am going מַשְׁבִּ֜ית <S%H7673><s%> Behold I will cause to cease מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הַמָּק֥וֹם <S%H4725><s%> out of this place הַזֶּ֛ה <S%H2088><s%> this לְעֵינֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H5869><s%> in your eyes וּבִֽימֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H3117><s%> and in your days ק֤וֹל <S%H6963><s%> the voice שָׂשׂוֹן֙ <S%H8342><s%> of mirth וְק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> and the voice שִׂמְחָ֔ה <S%H8057><s%> of gladness ק֥וֹל <S%H6963><s%> the voice חָתָ֖ן <S%H2860><s%> of the bridegroom וְק֥וֹל <S%H6963><s%> and the voice כַּלָּֽה׃ <S%H3618><s%> of the bride

וְהָיָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> become כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> now when תַגִּיד֙ <S%H5046><s%> And it shall come to pass when thou shalt shew לָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> this people הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> this אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַדְּבָרִ֖ים <S%H1697><s%> all these words הָאֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these וְאָמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> and they shall say אֵלֶ֗יךָ <S%H413><s%> about עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against מֶה֩ <S%H4100><s%> what דִבֶּ֨ר <S%H1696><s%> pronounced יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> unto thee Wherefore hath the LORD עָלֵ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H5921><s%> against אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָרָעָ֤ה <S%H7451><s%> evil הַגְּדוֹלָה֙ <S%H1419><s%> all this great הַזֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> us וּמֶ֤ה <S%H4100><s%> and what עֲוֹנֵ֙נוּ֙ <S%H5771><s%> is our iniquity וּמֶ֣ה <S%H4100><s%> what חַטָּאתֵ֔נוּ <S%H2403><s%> is our sin אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which חָטָ֖אנוּ <S%H2398><s%> that we have committed לַֽיהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> against the LORD אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H430><s%> angels

וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <S%H559><s%> Then shalt thou say אֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H413><s%> about עַל֩ <S%H5921><s%> and אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after עָזְב֨וּ <S%H5800><s%> have forsaken אֲבוֹתֵיכֶ֤ם <S%H1><s%> unto them Because your fathers אוֹתִי֙ <S%H853><s%> נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> me saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וַיֵּלְכ֗וּ <S%H1980><s%> along אַֽחֲרֵי֙ <S%H310><s%> after אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> gods אֲחֵרִ֔ים <S%H312><s%> other וַיַּעַבְד֖וּם <S%H5647><s%> and have served וַיִּשְׁתַּחֲו֣וּ <S%H7812><s%> them and have worshipped לָהֶ֑ם וְאֹתִ֣י <S%H853><s%> עָזָ֔בוּ <S%H5800><s%> them and have forsaken וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> תּוֹרָתִ֖י <S%H8451><s%> my law לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not שָׁמָֽרוּ׃ <S%H8104><s%> me and have not kept

וְאַתֶּ֛ם <S%H859><s%> you הֲרֵעֹתֶ֥ם <S%H7489><s%> worse לַעֲשׂ֖וֹת <S%H6213><s%> And ye have done מֵאֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H1><s%> than your fathers וְהִנְּכֶ֣ם <S%H2005><s%> behold הֹלְכִ֗ים <S%H1980><s%> ye walk אִ֚ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every one אַֽחֲרֵי֙ <S%H310><s%> after שְׁרִר֣וּת <S%H8307><s%> the imagination לִבּֽוֹ־ <S%H3820><s%> heart הָרָ֔ע <S%H7451><s%> of his evil לְבִלְתִּ֖י <S%H1115><s%> without שְׁמֹ֥עַ <S%H8085><s%> that they may not hearken אֵלָֽי׃ <S%H413><s%> about

וְהֵטַלְתִּ֣י <S%H2904><s%> Therefore will I cast אֶתְכֶ֗ם <S%H853><s%> מֵעַל֙ <S%H5921><s%> and הָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> you out of this land הַזֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> likewise עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> into הָאָ֕רֶץ <S%H776><s%> into a land אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> which לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor יְדַעְתֶּ֔ם <S%H3045><s%> that ye know אַתֶּ֖ם <S%H859><s%> you וַאֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H1><s%> not [neither] ye nor your fathers וַעֲבַדְתֶּם־ <S%H5647><s%> and there shall ye serve שָׁ֞ם <S%H8033><s%> and there אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֱלֹהִ֤ים <S%H430><s%> gods אֲחֵרִים֙ <S%H312><s%> other יוֹמָ֣ם <S%H3119><s%> day וָלַ֔יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> and night אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> which לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> no אֶתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> where I will not shew לָכֶ֖ם חֲנִינָֽה׃ <S%H2594><s%> you favour ס

לָכֵ֛ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore הִנֵּֽה־ <S%H2009><s%> behold יָמִ֥ים <S%H3117><s%> Therefore behold the days בָּאִ֖ים <S%H935><s%> come נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> will no יֵאָמֵ֥ר <S%H559><s%> that it shall no more be said עוֹד֙ <S%H5750><s%> longer חַי־ <S%H2416><s%> liveth יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> who הֶעֱלָ֛ה <S%H5927><s%> that brought up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> out of the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo חַי־ <S%H2416><s%> liveth יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> But The LORD אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> who הֶעֱלָ֜ה <S%H5927><s%> that brought up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> from the land צָפ֔וֹן <S%H6828><s%> of the north וּמִכֹּל֙ <S%H3605><s%> all הָֽאֲרָצ֔וֹת <S%H776><s%> and from all the lands אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which הִדִּיחָ֖ם <S%H5080><s%> whither he had driven שָׁ֑מָּה <S%H8033><s%> in it וַהֲשִֽׁבֹתִים֙ <S%H7725><s%> them and I will bring them again עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> to their own אַדְמָתָ֔ם <S%H127><s%> into their land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who נָתַ֖תִּי <S%H5414><s%> that I gave לַאֲבוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H1><s%> unto their fathers ס

הִנְנִ֨י <S%H2005><s%> I am going שֹׁלֵ֜חַ <S%H7971><s%> Behold I will send [לְדַוָּגִים כ] (לְדַיָּגִ֥ים <S%H1771><s%> fisherman ק) רַבִּ֛ים <S%H7227><s%> for many נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וְדִיג֑וּם <S%H1770><s%> and they shall fish וְאַֽחֲרֵי־ <S%H310><s%> them and after כֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> after that אֶשְׁלַח֙ <S%H7971><s%> will I send לְרַבִּ֣ים <S%H7227><s%> for many צַיָּדִ֔ים <S%H6719><s%> hunters וְצָד֞וּם <S%H6679><s%> and they shall hunt מֵעַ֤ל <S%H5921><s%> from כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every הַר֙ <S%H2022><s%> them from every mountain וּמֵעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> and כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and every גִּבְעָ֔ה <S%H1389><s%> and from every hill וּמִנְּקִיקֵ֖י <S%H5357><s%> and out of the holes הַסְּלָעִֽים׃ <S%H5553><s%> of the rocks
